markdown:
These creatures look like roiling clouds of black smoke churning above a mound of burning refuse. Leering faces form and fade in the smoke above, while the burning trash writhes in spasmodic lurches, obviously alive. **[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 19 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14 [Filth Fire](/Monsters.aspx?ID=656) **Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 110 2.0 **Perception** +11; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), smoke vision **Languages** [Ignan](/Languages.aspx?ID=18); can't speak any language **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9 **Str** +1 **Dex** +5 **Con** +4 **Int** -2 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +0 **Smoke Vision** The filth fire ignores the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition from smoke. --- **AC** 21 **Fort** +12 **Ref** +13 **Will** +9 **HP** 70 **Immunities** bleed, fire, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145) **Weaknesses** cold 5 --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** burning lash +13 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 2d6+3 bludgeoning plus 1d6 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) **Ranged** ember ball +13 ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 1d6+3 bludgeoning plus 1d6 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) **Noxious Burst** Toxic materials and churning rubbish within the filth fire's body explode in one of three ways. The filth fire chooses the effect, but it can't make the same choice twice in a row.
  • Fiery Beam ([evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The filth fire expels a 30-foot line of flame that deals 3d6 fire damage with a DC 21 basic Reflex save.
  • Shrapnel Blast ([evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The filth fire shoots jagged rubbish out in a 5-foot emanation that deals 2d12 piercing damage with a DC 21 basic Reflex save.
  • Toxic Fumes ([evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The filth fire belches a 15-foot cone of toxic smoke that deals 2d6 poison damage (DC 21 basic Fortitude save). A creature that fails is also [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) (or sickened 2 on a critical failure).
name: Filth Fire

summary_markdown: These creatures look like roiling clouds of black smoke churning above a mound of burning refuse. Leering faces form and fade in the smoke above, …
text: Filth Fire These creatures look like roiling clouds of black smoke churning above a mound of burning refuse. Leering faces form and fade in the smoke above, while the burning trash writhes in spasmodic lurches, obviously alive. Recall Knowledge - Elemental (Arcana, Nature): DC 19 Unspecific Lore : DC 17 Specific Lore : DC 14 Filth Fire Source Bestiary 2 pg. 110 2.0 Perception +11; darkvision, smoke vision Languages Ignan; can't speak any language Skills Acrobatics +13, Athletics +9 Str +1 Dex +5 Con +4 Int -2 Wis +3 Cha +0 Smoke Vision The filth fire ignores the concealed condition from smoke. --- AC 21 Fort +12 Ref +13 Will +9 HP 70 Immunities bleed, fire, paralyzed, poison, sleep Weaknesses cold 5 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action burning lash +13 (Finesse), Damage 2d6+3 bludgeoning plus 1d6 persistent fire Ranged Single Action ember ball +13 (Fire, range increment 20 feet), Damage 1d6+3 bludgeoning plus 1d6 persistent fire Noxious Burst Two Actions Toxic materials and churning rubbish within the filth fire's body explode in one of three ways. The filth fire chooses the effect, but it can't make the same choice twice in a row. Fiery Beam (evocation, fire, primal) The filth fire expels a 30-foot line of flame that deals 3d6 fire damage with a DC 21 basic Reflex save. Shrapnel Blast (evocation, primal) The filth fire shoots jagged rubbish out in a 5-foot emanation that deals 2d12 piercing damage with a DC 21 basic Reflex save. Toxic Fumes (evocation, poison, primal) The filth fire belches a 15-foot cone of toxic smoke that deals 2d6 poison damage (DC 21 basic Fortitude save). A creature that fails is also sickened 1 (or sickened 2 on a critical failure).
